nari-labs/dia2

Streaming dialogue TTS model for conversations in realtime

View on index

Related repos

  • Text-to-dialogue model, clones voices
  • Self-host Dia TTS with web UI, OpenAI API, voice cloning, and dialogue support
  • Listens to a microphone and sends speech-to-text transcripts in real time
  • real-time speech-to-text and translation using Whisper models
  • Framework for building voice and chat bots with real-time AI
  • Framework for real-time speaker diarization
  • Real-time transcription using Faster-Whisper
  • Text-to-speech library with advanced models in 17 languages (legacy models in 1100+), and tools for custom voice training
